dict.string:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import json import urllib
__author__ = 'Yvonne'
theQuery = "{query}"
rssurl = 'http://www.frdic.com/dicts/prefix/' + urllib.quote(theQuery) txt = urllib.urlopen(rssurl).read()
items = txt[2:-2].split('},{') print "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>\n<items>"
links = [] titles = [] subs = []
for x in items:
i_st = x.find('"iscghint"')+11 i_ed = x.find(',', i_st) boolean = x[i_st:i_ed]
v_st = x.find('"value"')+9 v_ed = x.find('"', v_st) title = x[v_st:v_ed]
l_st = x.find('"label"')+9 l_ed = x.find('"', l_st) if x[l_st] == ' ': l_st += 3 sub = x[l_st:l_ed]
if boolean == "true" and sub == theQuery: link = 'http://www.frdic.com/dicts/fr/'+urllib.quote(title)
links.append(link) titles.append(sub + "可能是动词" + title + "的变位形式") subs.append("变位提示")
if boolean == "true" and title == theQuery: # error: & will jump out alfred #link = 'http://www.frdic.com/dicts/fr/'+urllib.quote(sub)+'?forcecg=true&cgformidx=0' link = 'http://www.frdic.com/dicts/fr/'+urllib.quote(sub)+'?forcecg=true'
links.append(link) titles.append("显示" + sub + "的变位") subs.append("变位提示")
if boolean == "false": link = 'http://www.frdic.com/dicts/fr/'+urllib.quote(title)
links.append(link) titles.append(title) subs.append(sub)
for i in range(1, len(links)): print " <item uid=\"dics\" arg=\""+ links[i] +"\">" print " <title>" + titles[i] + "</title>" print " <subtitle>" + subs[i] + "</subtitle>" print " <quicklookurl>" + links[i] + "</quicklookurl>" print " </item>"
print " <item uid=\"dics\" arg=\""+ links[0] +"\">" print " <title>" + titles[0] + "</title>" print " <subtitle>" + subs[0] + "</subtitle>" print " <quicklookurl>" + links[0] + "</quicklookurl>" print " </item>"
print "</items>\n"
